meta.name: uptime
meta.description: See how long the bot has been online

meta.name: commit
meta.description: See what git commit the bot is currently running on

meta.name: sendmessage
meta.description: Send a message as the bot

options.name: message
options.description: Message to send

meta.name: announce
meta.description: Send an announcement as the bot

options.name: message
options.description: Message to send

options.name: title
options.description: Title for the announcement embed. Defaults to "Announcement"

options.name: ping
options.description: Role to ping

meta.name: dm
meta.description: Send a private message as the bot

options.name: user
options.description: Member to send the message to

options.name: message
options.description: Message to send

options.name: time
options.description: Amount of time to be reminded in. For example: 1d2h3m4s (1 day, 2 hours, 3 minutes, and 4 seconds)

options.name: reminder
options.description: What you're reminding yourself of

options.name: title
options.description: Title of the ticket

moderation.name: purge
moderation.description: Delete a number of messages at once

options.name: messages
options.description: Number of messages to delete

options.name: channel
options.description: Channel to delete messages from

options.name: reason
options.description: Reason for deleting the messages

server_info.name: rules
server_info.description: Get a list of server rules

server_info.name: rule
server_info.description: Look at a specific server rule

options.name: rule
options.description: Number of rule to look at

server_info.name: suggest
server_info.description: Make a suggestion to improve the server

options.name: suggestion
options.description: The suggestion to make

options.name: suggestion_id
options.description: Message ID of the suggestion

options.name: accept
options.description: Whether or not to accept the suggestion

options.name: response
options.description: Response to the suggestion

db_commands.name: add-text-command
db_commands.description: Add a custom text-based database command

db_commands.name: add-embed-command
db_commands.description: Add a custom embed-based database command

options.name: command_name
options.description: Name of the command to create

options.name: command_description
options.description: Description of the command to create

options.name: command_is_global
options.description: True if the command should be available to run outside the server

options.name: title
options.description: Title for the embed to send when the command is run

options.name: url
options.description: URL associated with embed title

options.name: description
options.description: Description for the embed

options.name: color
options.description: Accent color for the embed as an RGB hex code (ex. 0x00FF00 for pure green)

options.name: thumbnail
options.description: URL to image to show on the top right of the embed

options.name: image
options.description: URL to image to show near the bottom of the embed

options.name: video
options.description: URL to video file to play near the bottom of the embed

options.name: timestamp
options.description: Date and time (in Unix timestamp format) to put on the bottom of the embed

options.name: author_name
options.description: Author name

options.name: author_url
options.description: URL associated with author name

options.name: author_icon_url
options.description: URL to icon image to show to the left of the author name

options.name: footer_text
options.description: Text to put in the embed footer

options.name: footer_icon_url
options.description: URL to icon image to show to the left of the footer text

db_commands.name: add-embed-command-field
db_commands.description: Add a field to a custom embed-based database command

options.name: name
options.description: Name of the command to modify

db_commands.name: remove-embed-command-field
db_commands.description: Remove an embed field in a custom database command

options.name: name
options.description: Name of the command to modify

db_commands.name: edit-embed-command-field
db_commands.description: Edit an embed field in a custom database command

options.name: name
options.description: Name of the command to modify

options.name: name
options.description: Name of the command to modify

db_commands.name: db-command-list
db_commands.description: Get a list of commands in database
